oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Identifizierung von ökol. u. konv. Anbauvarianten bei DOK-Weizen mittels Fluoreszenz-Anregungs-Spektroskopie
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Strube, J.
Stolz, P.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crop health, quality, protection
Food security, food quality and human health
Specific methods
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: At coded samples of wheat out of the DOK-trial of FiBL (Switzerland) it was possible to identify the organic and conventional grown variants. The method used was fluorescence-excitation-spectroscopy of whole samples. It was also possible to show differences between biodynamic and organic variants.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Strube, J. and Stolz, P. (2005) Identifizierung von ökol. u. konv. Anbauvarianten bei DOK-Weizen mittels Fluoreszenz-Anregungs-Spektroskopie. [Identification of organic and conventional culture variants of DOK-wheat by fluorescence-excitation-spectroscopy.] In: Heß, J and Rahmann, G (Eds.) Ende der Nische, Beiträge zur 8. Wissenschaftstagung Ökologischer Landbau, kassel university press GmbH, Kassel.
